CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corporation Limited

Address.label: Address
Address.value: DUNHUA SOUTH ROAD 15TH FLOOR, B, NO. 77, SECTION. 2, TAIPEI, 106, Taiwan

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Asia Pacific Wire & Cable Corp Ltd is a holding company. It is principally engaged in owning operating companies engaged in the power cable, telecommunication cable, enameled wire, and electronic cable industry. It also provides project engineering services to customers. Some of its products are Bare wires, Power cables, Communication cables, Electronic wires & cables, and Enamelled wires. The company's geographical segments are North Asia, Thailand, and Rest of the World.
